o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: Check Entity Example Has An Example Record (MDDE)
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: DijkC1
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that an entity example has a valid record
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following objects do not pass custom check:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript: Function %Check%(obj) %Check% = True Dim exampleRecords : Set exampleRecords = obj.GetExtendedCollection("mdde_ExampleRecords", False) Dim exampleDatatype exampleDatatype = obj.GetExtendedAttributeText("mdde_ExampleDataType") 'we raise an error if there is no example record found for the example entity If exampleRecords is nothing Or exampleRecords.Count = 0 Then %Check% = False WriteInfo("ExampleEntity: [" & obj.Name & "] with type: [" & exampleDatatype & "] is missing an example record") End if End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
